meanings.definition: The act or process of regenerating.
meanings.sent1: After many regenerations, the forest was lush and green again.
meanings.sent2: The regenerations of the damaged cells in his body amazed the doctors.
meanings.sent3: The regenerations of the town's economy brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness sparked a regeneration of hope in the hearts of those around her.
meanings.sent5: The regenerations of the old building turned it into a modern marvel.

meanings.sent1: The regenerations of the garden made it a peaceful retreat.
meanings.sent2: His regenerations after the surgery were quicker than expected.
meanings.sent3: The regenerations of the sleepy town brought new life to its streets.
meanings.sent4: The regenerations of her spirit were evident in her bright smile.
meanings.sent5: The regenerations of the riverbanks created a beautiful habitat for wildlife.

meanings.definition: A new version or form of something.
meanings.sent1: Each season brings a new regeneration of flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The regenerations of technology continue to amaze us.
meanings.sent3: The regenerations of the classic tale gave it a modern twist.
meanings.sent4: His regenerations of the old car turned it into a sleek vehicle.
meanings.sent5: The regenerations of the recipe made it even more delicious.
